name: io.github.blencorp/capture-mcp-server
description: Federal procurement and spending data capture through SAM.gov, USASpending.gov, and Tango APIs

environmentVariables.name: SAM_GOV_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Optional API key from sam.gov/data-services/API. Enables 6 additional tools: 4 SAM.gov tools (entities, opportunities, details, exclusions) + 2 Join tools (entity+awards, opportunity+context).

environmentVariables.name: TANGO_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Optional API key from tango.makegov.com. Enables 5 Tango tools: contracts, grants, vendor profiles, opportunities, and spending summaries.

tools.name: search_sam_entities
tools.description: Search for federal entities/businesses registered in SAM.gov. Requires SAM_GOV_API_KEY.

tools.name: get_sam_opportunities
tools.description: Fetch federal contract opportunities from SAM.gov. Requires SAM_GOV_API_KEY.

tools.name: get_sam_entity_details
tools.description: Get comprehensive details for a specific entity by UEI from SAM.gov. Requires SAM_GOV_API_KEY.

tools.name: check_sam_exclusions
tools.description: Check if an entity is excluded from federal contracting in SAM.gov. Requires SAM_GOV_API_KEY.

tools.name: get_usaspending_awards
tools.description: Get federal awards data for a specific agency from USASpending.gov. No API key required.

tools.name: get_usaspending_spending_by_category
tools.description: Get spending breakdown by award category from USASpending.gov. No API key required.

tools.name: get_usaspending_budgetary_resources
tools.description: Get budgetary resources and obligations for an agency from USASpending.gov. No API key required.

tools.name: search_usaspending_awards_by_recipient
tools.description: Search for federal awards by recipient name in USASpending.gov. No API key required.

tools.name: get_entity_and_awards
tools.description: Combine SAM entity data with USASpending award history in a single query. Requires SAM_GOV_API_KEY.

tools.name: get_opportunity_spending_context
tools.description: Link SAM.gov opportunities with historical spending context from USASpending.gov. Requires SAM_GOV_API_KEY.

tools.name: search_tango_contracts
tools.description: Search federal contracts through Tango's unified API. Requires TANGO_API_KEY.

tools.name: search_tango_grants
tools.description: Search federal grants and financial assistance through Tango API. Requires TANGO_API_KEY.

tools.name: get_tango_vendor_profile
tools.description: Get comprehensive vendor profiles with history from Tango API. Requires TANGO_API_KEY.

tools.name: search_tango_opportunities
tools.description: Search federal contract opportunities with forecasts from Tango API. Requires TANGO_API_KEY.

tools.name: get_tango_spending_summary
tools.description: Get spending summaries and analytics from Tango API. Requires TANGO_API_KEY.
